description: Nu siwo katã ezãla wɔ le Wikimedia ƒe wikiwo katã dzi nedze.
form-isPrefixPattern: Ɖe ne wòazã nyanuwuwuwo adi nu
form-from: Ŋuɖoɖo siwo le afi siawo hã
form-from-rc: Tɔtrɔ yeyewo ko (ŋkeke 30 siwo va yi)
form-from-hr: Gaƒoƒo si va yi ɖeɖe tɔ
results-limited: Wiki ɖeka ƒe ŋuɖoɖowo megawu $1 o.
results-lag-warning: Ɖewohĩ tɔtrɔ yeyetɔwo medze le ŋuɖoɖoawo me o. Nyatakakanɔƒe la mele dɔ wɔm nyuie o. Kpɔ [https://tools.wmflabs.org/replag/ Replag].
